channel.title: Abouts on Apache Iceberg
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Apache Iceberg

item.title: What is Iceberg?
item.description: Iceberg is a high-performance format for huge analytic tables. Iceberg brings the reliability and simplicity of SQL tables to big data, while making it possible for engines like Spark, Trino, Flink, Presto, Hive and Impala to safely work with the same tables, at the same time. Learn More
